ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class UnitTypeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.UnitTypeController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class UnitTypeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller that handles HTTP requests for UnitType objects in the TOMi system.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot, Iliya Kiritchkov

      Provides services for managing UnitTypes.

      • getActiveUnitTypes

        @GetMapping(value="/unit_types")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UnitType>> getActiveUnitTypes(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                  UserAuthManager authMan)
        Gets all the active UnitTypes.
        Parameters:
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        List of Resources representing the active UnitTypes

      • getUnitType

        @GetMapping(value="unit_types/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UnitType> getUnitType(@PathVariable
                                                                                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                        @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                        UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a resource representing the requested UnitType to the source of a GET request to /unit_types/id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the UnitType
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Resource representing the UnitType object

      • createUnitType

        @PostMapping(value="/unit_types")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createUnitType(@RequestBody
                                                                                                    UnitType newUnitType,
                                                                                                    @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                    UserAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                             throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new UnitType with the attributes provided in the POST request to /unit_types.
        Parameters:
        newUnitType - a UnitType object with required information
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        response containing links to the newly created UnitType
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • updateUnitType

        @PutMapping(value="/unit_types/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateUnitType(@PathVariable
                                                                                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                        UnitType newUnitType,
                                                                                                        @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                        UserAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                                 throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Updates the attributes for a UnitType with the provided id with the attributes provided in the PUT request to /unit_types/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the UnitType to update
        newUnitType - the updated UnitType
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        response containing a link to the updated UnitType
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • setUnitTypeInactive

        @DeleteMapping(value="/unit_types/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setUnitTypeInactive(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                java.lang.Long id)
        Sets the requested UnitType's active attribute to false, removing it from the list of active UnitTypes. Responds to the DELETE requests to /unit_types/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the task to be set inactive
        Returns:
        a response without any content

      • handleExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value=UnitTypeNotFoundException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleExceptions(java.lang.Exception e)
        Informs the client that an exception has occurred. In order to keep the server inner workings private a generic 400 bad request is used.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that had occurred
        Returns:
        A 400 Bad Request Response
